00030 void CallTable::reset()
00031 {
00032     m_strErrMsg = "";
00033     m_strIndexFile = "";
00034 
00035     // default to bi-allelic
00036     m_iMaxAlleles = 2; 
00037     m_iMaxCNStates = 2;
00038     m_iNextRowIndex = 0;
00039 }
00040 
00041 bool CallTable::readFile(string strIndexFile)
00042 {
00043     ifstream file;
00044     file.open(strIndexFile.c_str());
00045     if (!file.is_open()) {
00046         setErrMsg("Failed to open index file for reading.\tFile: " + strIndexFile);
00047         return false;
00048     }
00049 
00050     reset();
00051     char szLine[MAX_LINE];
00052     while (file.getline(szLine, MAX_LINE)) {
00053         string strLine = szLine;
00054         Util::trimString(strLine);
00055         if (strLine.find("#%%max-alleles=") == 0) {
00056             string strMaxAlleles = strLine.substr(15);
00057             Util::trimString(strMaxAlleles);
00058             m_iMaxAlleles = Convert::toInt(strMaxAlleles);
00059         }
00060         else if (strLine.find("#%%max-cn-states=") == 0) {
00061             string strMaxCNStates = strLine.substr(17);
00062             Util::trimString(strMaxCNStates);
00063             m_iMaxCNStates = Convert::toInt(strMaxCNStates);
00064         }
00065         else if (strLine.find("#%%call-code-") == 0) {
00066             vector<string> vTokens, vParts;
00067             Util::chopString(strLine, "=", vTokens);
00068             if (vTokens.size() == 2) {
00069                 string strField = vTokens[1];
00070                 Util::trimString(strField);
00071                 Util::chopString(strField, ":", vParts);
00072                 if (vParts.size() == 3) {
00073                     string strCallName = vParts[0]; Util::trimString(strCallName);
00074                     string strCallCode = vParts[1]; Util::trimString(strCallCode);
00075                     string strCNState = vParts[2]; Util::trimString(strCNState);
00076                     int iCallCode, iCNState;
00077                     iCallCode = Convert::toInt(strCallCode);
00078                     iCNState = Convert::toInt(strCNState);
00079                     add(strCallName, iCallCode, iCNState);
00080                 }
00081             }
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     file.close();
00086 
00087     // save index file name
00088     setIndexFile(strIndexFile);
00089 
00090     return true;
00091 }

00093 bool CallTable::add(CallRow& row)
00094 {
00095     try {
00096         push_back(row);
00097     }
00098     catch (...) {
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101     return true;
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool CallTable::add(string strCallName, int iCallCode, int iCNState)
00105 {
00106     try {
00107         CallRow row;
00108         row.setRowIndex(nextRowIndex());
00109         row.setCallName(strCallName);
00110         row.setCallCode(iCallCode);
00111         row.setCNState(iCNState);
00112         add(row);
00113     }
00114     catch (...) {
00115         return false;
00116     }
00117     return true;
00118 }

00120 void CallTable::sortByRowIndex()
00121 {
00122     std::sort(begin(), end(), CallRow::compareRowIndex);

00130 void CallTable::sortByCallNameCNState()
00131 {
00132     std::sort(begin(), end(), CallRow::compareCallNameCNState);

00135 CallTable::iterator CallTable::find(std::string strCallName)
00136 {
00137     CallTable::iterator iterFind;
00138     CallRow search;
00139     search.setCallName(strCallName);
00140     iterFind = lower_bound(begin(), end(), search, CallRow::compareCallName);
00141     if (iterFind != end() && iterFind->getCallName() == strCallName) {
00142         return iterFind;
00143     }
00144     else {
00145         return end();
00146     }
00147 }
00148 
00149 CallTable::iterator CallTable::find(std::string strCallName, int iCNState)
00150 {
00151     CallTable::iterator iterFind;
00152     CallRow search;
00153     search.setCallName(strCallName);
00154     search.setCNState(iCNState);
00155     iterFind = lower_bound(begin(), end(), search, CallRow::compareCallName);
00156     if (iterFind != end() && iterFind->getCallName() == strCallName) {
00157         return iterFind;
00158     }
00159     else {
00160         return end();
00161     }
00162 }

00173 void CallRow::reset()
00174 {
00175     m_iRowIndex = 0;
00176     m_strCallName = "";
00177     m_iCallCode = 0;
00178     m_iCNState = 0;

00181 bool CallRow::compareRowIndex(const CallRow& elem1, const CallRow& elem2)
00182 {
00183     return (elem1.m_iRowIndex < elem2.m_iRowIndex);
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool CallRow::compareCallName(const CallRow& elem1, const CallRow& elem2)
00187 {
00188     return (elem1.m_strCallName < elem2.m_strCallName);
00189 }
00190 
00191 bool CallRow::compareCallNameCNState(const CallRow& elem1, const CallRow& elem2)
00192 {
00193     if (elem1.m_strCallName != elem2.m_strCallName) { 
00194         return (elem1.m_strCallName < elem2.m_strCallName); 
00195     }
00196     return (elem1.m_iCNState < elem2.m_iCNState);
00197 }
00198 
00199 string CallRow::getRowStr()
00200 {
00201     string strRow = "";
00202     strRow += "RowIndex: " + Convert::toString(m_iRowIndex);
00203     strRow += ", CallName: " + m_strCallName;
00204     strRow += ", CallCode: " + Convert::toString(m_iCallCode);
00205     strRow += ", CNState: " + Convert::toString(m_iCNState);    
00206     return strRow;
00207 }
